name: custom gemstone stackers
description:
sweet stacking rings - the options are endless.  

As shown, the first set is 14k rose gold with two different rubies:  one faceted (aka diamond cut), the other rough cut (aka cabochon) and one opal cabochon.

The second set is twelve thin sterling silver bands, three with rough cut (or cabochon) emeralds.

These are made to order-- other possible stones include rough diamonds, sapphires, tourmaline, pearl (pricing, of course, varies)  please email your thoughts and we can design something stellar!

xoxo
Coco

options.name: three 14k rose gold, ruby and opal rings
twelve sterling silver and rough emerald rings

name: the Breaking Bad bad mofo money clip
description:
We did this design on sterling silver with rose gold as a request from Albuquerque Studios in 2008. They were getting ready to release a show they were real excited about and wanted to give this as a gift to the show's lead actor. Now, as the series counts down to the grande finale, we could not be more proud to have a hand in the way Walter White carries his wad. Available in either sterling silver or red brass. it's roughly 1"x2" and are hand made to order so please allow for a one to three week turn around before shipping. once we receive your order we will contact you to confirm inscription and symbol. we can do a stamped, personal inscription on the back, starting at an additional $20. 3rd photo credit: Gordon Chibroski / Staff Photographer, Portland Press Herald from this article: Portland Press Herald, Front Page, August 15, 2013

Additional styles shown here: lovinganvil.com/product/money-clips-for-the-big-spenders

name: tiny palladium white gold band
description: a delicate and detailed palladium white gold band. and i emphasize, no part of this was cast or etched. it's completely hand made, hand wrought and hand stamped. as shown here : a 2mm x 1mm palladium white gold band (traditional 14k white, yellow or rose gold also available). the pattern extends around approximately half of the band, with half of the band smooth, or without pattern. up to six letters hand stamped on the inside of the ring. pricing as listed for rings up to us size 9. larger sizes will increase the price some. originally designed as a wedding custom set, as shown in the last group of photos with a modified "huge" style sterling silver band. find our huge band here (blank or custom option as listed) oxox coco

name: one of a kind - current collection
description:
three rings, 
completely individual and unique stones

these rings really shouldn't be resized.  if the sizes listed don't work for you, drop a line and we'll work together to create a custom ring in the same vein.


here are:

1. sterling and fine silver, vintage blue glass, 22mm, size 8.5-9.
2. sterling, fine silver and brass rivet.  43mmx46mm picture jasper heart with a 5mm moonstone, size 8.
3. pink agate and red brass knuckes, 75mm x 38mm, size 7-9.


check back often, this selection will change.

xoxo
coco

name: atlantic beach pebble series
description:
a current selection of jewels made from stones collected on family beach walks.  we live not too far from the ocean in southern maine, and always come home with pockets weighted down after our strolls on the beach.

these rings really shouldn't be resized so if the sizes listed do not work for you, but you'd like a similar ring, please drop a line and we can set up a custom project.

all rings and earrings are sterling silver with fine silver settings.  and the stones set have been long long tumbled in the atlantic ocean.

1. yin yang organic heart, size 7, 35mm x 23mm
2. orange pebble, size 7, 15mm x 12mm
3. gray pebble, size 6.5, 20mm x 15mm
small white pebble ring, size 7.25 8mm round(ish)
mostly matched white stone earrings, 10mm x 14mm (ish)
larger white pebble ring, size 9, 16mm x 12mm

xoxo
coco

the white pebble earring and ring set makes lovely bridal and/or bridesmaid gift sets.  any color scheme could be fabricated for an earring/ring set.

name: wear a book on your hands - jabberwocky ring set
description:
the complete poem of jabberwocky, lovingly pounded into a set of red brass rings.  a one of a kind art piece.

the larger ring is about 61mm x 47mm - and a size 8.5. the band is about 17mm tall.
the smaller ring is about 51mm x 49mm and also an 8.5. the band is just shy of 17mm tall.

the idea isn't so much readability as creating a pattern or texture with the words. and knowing all the words of the passage are with you. it is absolutely readable, but doesn't follow the grammatical rules of dividing words or punctuation. there is very little punctuation if any.

the fabrication is very satisfying and time consuming. a labor of love. 
also available in sterling silver.
14k gold is also an option, please contact us for gold pricing.
these rings are customizable with poetry or writing passage of your choice.  again, please contact us for custom quotes.


oxox
coco

name: knock on wood rings
description:
control chaos and keep things on the positive swing with your very own portable piece of wood. and to keep focused, it's stamped knock on wood on the back side of the ring.

the rectangle wood pieces are 40mm x 20mm
the square is 35mm.

both are sterling rings with fine silver settings.  

these rings will be custom made to your size. upon receiving your order we will contact you for sizing details and assistance.

xoxo
coco

name: jingle jangle bangles
description:
a set of ten bangles to make the wrist sound so sweet!

wear them all together or give them to friends ala friendship bracelet. lightweight and well work hardened to give them the jinglejangle sound.

available individually or in sets of ten, made of either sterling silver, red brass, and 14k gold.  we would be happy to mix various metals for a custom set as well.

upon receiving your order we will contact you for sizing details and assistance.

xoxo
coco

name: thick as thieves - friendship, promise or wedding bands
description:
i love this sentiment. conjures up images of sitting at a round, thick wood table, whispering a plan by candlelight and mugs of wine.

the intent, when i made them, was more for a friendship ring. i realize it's kind of expensive for a gift between friends. maybe not. and, in that same vein, hopefully your partner is your bff, and you're bound by a code of trust, love and honor.

at any rate. this was made to honor partners in crime, whatever your definition of mischief may be.

the options are endless. another language, another sentiment - drop a line and we'll work it into an awesome reality. here i have them stamped one on the inside and one on the out. this, again, is more for example than standard -- to show two options. but your ring set will match with both rings either reading on the interior or exterior - whatever your preference. or they can be like shown -- whatever pleases you most!

another successful style - our husband/wife paired bands:
just in case you need help remembering. (gil and i were ...boyfriend and girlfriend for so long, it took us a while to get into the habit of changing our terminology.)

or maybe you just like labeling things. or maybe you enjoy overstating the obvious. (we have that in common!)


options! options!
husband/wife
husband/husband
wife/wife
esposo/esposa
esposo/esposo
esposa/esposa

and really, the options are endless. another language, another sentiment - drop a line and we'll work it into an awesome reality.

the sterling bands are just over 6mm tall and 2mm thick. 
these are made to order per your sizing.  we will contact you shortly after receiving your order to confirm sizing and details.  

also available in white or yellow gold.  the shipping as reflected in this listing is for the sterling set only.  i recommend overnight domestic shipping for a cost of $20 for the gold sets.  international orders shipping will vary by location.

all prices in sterling unless otherwise indicated.
esposa in third photo is shown in 14k white gold.

xoxo
coco

name: the simplest sweetest above the knuckle midfinger whisper of a ring
description:
ust a glint and a flash of silver to dance on your hand. I love how it catches my eye when gesturing or driving.

and for such a simple and delicate band, it adds a noticeable decoration to the hand. only been wearing mine for a few days and already I feel a bit ...unadorned without it.

each ring is custom made.  once we receive your order we will contact you for sizing details.  mid-finger ring sizing is not something people commonly know so we can assist you with finding that size as well.

this photo shows a sterling silver ring! it can also be made in red brass for $6 ea and 14k yellow, rose or white gold for $74 ea. 

xoxo
coco

name: farrah rings -  colorful polka dot series
description:
a modern and clean take on our farrah ring design. 

we LOVE this large statement ring.  made with extreme attention to detail and quality, it's a sterling silver ring with a 35mm fused glass cabochon set with fine silver.

this will be made custom to your desired ringsize and we will contact you upon receiving your order to get your size.  shown are the colors currently in stock at our workbench.  a cacophony of other colors are available with an additional two weeks time.  please contact us for details.

each fused glass cabochon is individually and artist made in the usa.
in addition to the round shape, a square-ish shape is also available.

xoxo
coco

name: polka dot 14k gold whisper promise ring
description:
a 14k white gold band, and a rose gold accent. just a kiss. besito besito.

the band is just over one millimeter thick, and the rose gold is just about 2mm, organically round. let's call it round-ish.

this is shown in white and rose gold combination.  it can be made in any manner of 14k white, yellow and rose gold.  

this will be custom made to your size. once we receive your order we will contact you for sizing details.

xoxo
coco

a big blue sky. springtime and hope and growth and serene. 

another completely custom option for turquoise rings.

name: this too shall pass - a word band
description:
i take sobering solace in this statement.

recently we learned that the phrase's story is actually tied to being imprinted on a ring.

"The phrase seems to have originated in the writings of the medieval Persian Sufi poets, and is often attached to a fable of a great king who is humbled by the simple words. Some versions of the fable, beginning with that of Attar of Nishapur, add the detail that the phrase is inscribed on a ring, which therefore has the ability to make the happy man sad and the sad man happy."

either way it speaks to you in that moment, it's helpful to keep in mind. 

a sterling silver ring, 6mm x 2mm in dimension

this ring will be custom made to your size. upon receiving your order we will contact you for sizing details and custom phrase options.

name: galaxy rings - onyx and sterling
description:
a galaxy on your finger. little orbiting planets. or bits of universe. either way, it's reminiscent of the night sky.

a stack of twelve rings. nine simple 1mm bands, and three 1mm bands with a 3mm round black onyx.

they aren't connected or fastened together so options are endless. play with the pattern or divide them between fingers.

14k gold options are also available.

these will be custom made to your size.  once we receive your order we will contact you for sizing details.

xoxo
coco

name: our signature stacking rings
description:
simple, hand wrought, and stellar.
now available in sterling silver, red brass or 14k gold.

our stackers in their most popular configurations:

solo
quintet 
or a decuplet (i didn't know that, either)

to wear together or one by one, or shared with friends.  
a custom set of a varied assortment of weights, per our design and discretion.  no worries, they will make a stellar stack for sure. 

as these make LOVELY midi, or above the knuckle, rings,  you could split the sizing to wear the set both ways.  let us know when we contact you for sizing details.
 
upon receiving your order, we will contact you for sizing details.


please contact us if you are interested in gold pricing.

xoxo
coco

description:
a fabulous, traditional yet edgy statement ring.

this sterling silver ring has a variety of stone options.  the 30mm x 40mm stones are set with fine silver.  check the drop down list for stones we currently have at our bench.  anything can be custom ordered, please contact us for details.

additionally, this ring will be made to your ring size.  upon receiving your order, we will contact you for sizing details and assistance.

if you would like to see individual photos of stones not pictured here, please contact us and we're happy to send those along!

oxox

available in solid sterling silver, red brass, and 14k yellow, rose or white gold.  custom assortments are welcome for stacking, mixing gold, silver and red brass.  please contact us if you do not see the option you desire listed.

name: our signature Simple series
description:
huge, massive and el jefe.  nothing more, nothing less.  and absolutely stellar in look and feel.

each are solid sterling silver, and approximately 2mm in girth.

the huge ring is a quarter inch wide
the massive ring is a half in wide
el jefe is a substantial three quarters inch wide.

these rings will be custom made to your size.  upon receiving your order we will contact you for sizing details and assistance.

xoxo
coco

name: the cigar band series
description:
the sterling silver cigar bands roughly half an inch tall, a rounded square shape. with one word on one side and the other word on the opposite. 

they will be made custom to your size, and we'll contact you upon receiving your order to get sizing details.

our standards and favorites are listed here.  custom options are always available, please contact us for details.
hell/highwater
feast/famine
lover/fighter
catch/hell
sinner/saint
hells/bells
hell/cat

name: money clips for the big spenders
description:
here's a money clip for the big bad sugar daddy in your life. whether it be someone else or your big old bad self.

a solid sterling silver clip - shaped and work hardened for mega-strength hold. and a little rose gold heart or other small, simple custom shape. if you have a different idea that what is offered, please ask. it's roughly 1"x2" and are made to order so please allow for a one to three week turn around before shipping. once we receive your order we will contact you to confirm inscription and symbol. we can do a stamped, personal inscription on the back, starting at an additional $20. a nod to samuel l., fo sure. oxox coco

name: heart knuckle ring as worn by Ms Esperanza Spalding at 2012 OSCARS
description:
These are the photos of the ring she wore, before it was jetted off for a life of excitement and big stage appearances!

We can customize one for you with an equally beautiful swirling brown agate. It won't be exactly like the one in the photo, but it will be beautiful. And made with BIG love.  

Currently we have two lovely agate hearts to choose from.  Hearts pictured as the sizes as follows:

1. 60mm x 45mm 
2. 58mm x 49mm

Esperanza Spalding's ring is 60mm x 45mm.

Silver (as opposed to brass) knuckles! The heart spans two (almost four) fingers. The ring will be made to your custom size, and the way the ring shank is constructed makes it very comfortable and flexible to various fingers.  


Let me know if you have any questions!
xoxo
coco

PRESS PIECE FROM NewYorkDesigner:

Behind Esperanza Spalding's Oscar Ring

Esperanza Spalding has played the White House, the Nobel Peace Prize Ceremony and last night she stole the show at the Oscars while wearing the massive and fabulous agate heart knuckle ring by Loving Anvil.

We began our conversations with Esperanza's stylist leading into the Grammys. Honored she would think of NewYorkDesigner.com, it was a big decision selecting which piece from which designer, as we have so much talent on the site. After more details came through, Loving Anvil was a sure fit and the Massive Agate Heart Knuckle Ring was the ring for such a beautiful, talented woman with such style of her own. Now, playing bass while donning a double-knuckled ring is no easy feat we were just as skeptical as we were excited this ring would be worn. THEN...could it really be that she selected it for the the Oscars instead? What? No way. Yup.

There was no need for the garish for this voice to attract attention. A simple, bold double knuckled ring it was - with a white, flowing gown. Millions saw and heard that for themselves when she took the stage with Louis Armstrong's What a Wonderful World for the traditional Academy Award's In Memoriam segment.

name: haiku mid-finger rings basho sez oldpondfrogjumpsin
description:
sterling silver, mid finger or above-the-knuckle rings.

these rings say:

furuike ya
kawazu tobikomu
mizu no oto

which is what the internets told me roughly translates as:

old pond
frog jumps in
*plop* (or sound of water splash)

one of the most famous haiku by one of the most famous haiku poets.

these rings will be made to your size.  upon receiving your order, we will contact you to get sizing details.

i do not understand japanese, so i am reliant on others for any sort of spelling/translation/etc. these are stamped with the roman alphabet, i am absolutely open to working in other characters if you were to supply a jpg or image of exactly what you wanted. etching will cost more just due to set up and all that. drop a line if you're interested.

also - maybe you fancy your own haiku on the haiku rings? fabulous. drop a line and we can work out those details as well!



xoxo
